verses.verse: וַיֹּסִ֙פוּ֙ <WH3254> vai-yo-Si-fu again בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> ha-Ra' evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיִּתְּנֵ֧ם <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nem delivered יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- them into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim of the Philistines אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> sha-Nah. years פ Peh

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> vay-Hi become אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> 'ish man אֶחָ֧ד <WH259> 'e-Chad And there was a certain מִצָּרְעָ֛ה <WH6881> mitz-tza-re-'Ah of Zorah מִמִּשְׁפַּ֥חַת <WH4940> mi-mish-Pa-chat of the family הַדָּנִ֖י <WH1839> had-da-Ni of the Danites וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> u-she-Mo whose name מָנ֑וֹחַ <WH4495> ma-No-ach; [was] Manoah וְאִשְׁתּ֥וֹ <WH802> ve-'ish-To and his wife עֲקָרָ֖ה <WH6135> 'a-ka-Rah [was] barren וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo no יָלָֽדָה׃ <WH3205> ya-La-dah. and bare

וַיֵּרָ֥א <WH7200> vai-ye-Ra appeared מַלְאַךְ־ <WH4397> mal-'ach- And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> ha-'ish-Shah; unto the woman וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלֶ֗יהָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-ha, to her הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> hin-neh- Behold נָ֤א <WH4994> na now אַתְּ־ <WH859> 'at- you עֲקָרָה֙ <WH6135> 'a-ka-Rah unto her Behold now thou [art] barren וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo no יָלַ֔דְתְּ <WH3205> ya-Ladt, and bearest וְהָרִ֖ית <WH2029> ve-ha-Rit not but thou shalt conceive וְיָלַ֥דְתְּ <WH3205> ve-ya-Ladt and bear בֵּֽן׃ <WH1121> Ben. a son

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah Now הִשָּׁ֣מְרִי <WH8104> hish-Sha-me-ri Now therefore beware נָ֔א <WH4994> Na, I beseech thee וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- nor תִּשְׁתִּ֖י <WH8354> tish-Ti I pray thee and drink יַ֣יִן <WH3196> Ya-yin not wine וְשֵׁכָ֑ר <WH7941> ve-she-Char; nor strong drink וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- nor תֹּאכְלִ֖י <WH398> toch-Li and eat כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any טָמֵֽא׃ <WH2931> ta-Me. not any unclean

כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki For הִנָּ֨ךְ <WH2009> hin-Nach behold הָרָ֜ה <WH2029> ha-Rah been וְיֹלַ֣דְתְּ <WH3205> ve-yo-Ladt and bear בֵּ֗ן <WH1121> Ben, a son וּמוֹרָה֙ <WH4177> u-mo-Rah and no razor לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- and no יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> ya-'a-Leh shall come עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> ro-Sho, on his head כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for נְזִ֧יר <WH5139> ne-Zir shall be a Nazarite אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> E-lo-Him unto God יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> han-Na-'ar for the child מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַבָּ֑טֶן <WH990> hab-Ba-ten; from the womb וְה֗וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu, and he יָחֵ֛ל <WH2490> ya-Chel and he shall begin לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <WH3467> le-ho-Shi-a' to deliver אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El Israel מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> mi-Yad out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim. of the Philistines

וַתָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vat-ta-Vo came הָאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> ha-'ish-Shah, Then the woman וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer and told לְאִישָׁהּ֮ <WH376> le-'i-Shah her husband לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> le-Mor saying אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> 'ish A man הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God בָּ֣א <WH935> ba came אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me וּמַרְאֵ֕הוּ <WH4758> u-mar-'E-hu unto me and his countenance כְּמַרְאֵ֛ה <WH4758> ke-mar-'Eh [was] like the countenance מַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach of an angel הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God נוֹרָ֣א <WH3372> no-Ra terrible מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; very וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor שְׁאִלְתִּ֙יהוּ֙ <WH7592> she-'il-Ti-hu but I asked אֵֽי־ <WH335> 'ei- where מִזֶּ֣ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh he ה֔וּא <WH1931> Hu, he וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo he me his name לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- nor הִגִּ֥יד <WH5046> hig-Gid him not whence he [was] neither told לִֽי׃ Li.

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer But he said לִ֔י Li, הִנָּ֥ךְ <WH2009> hin-Nach Behold הָרָ֖ה <WH2029> ha-Rah been וְיֹלַ֣דְתְּ <WH3205> ve-yo-Ladt and bear בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> Ben; a son וְעַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah and now אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nor תִּשְׁתִּ֣י׀ <WH8354> tish-Ti nor strong drink יַ֣יִן <WH3196> Ya-yin no wine וְשֵׁכָ֗ר <WH7941> ve-she-Char, and now drink וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- nor תֹּֽאכְלִי֙ <WH398> to-che-Li neither eat כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any טֻמְאָ֔ה <WH2932> tum-'Ah, any unclean כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for נְזִ֤יר <WH5139> ne-Zir shall be a Nazarite אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> E-lo-Him to God יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> han-Na-'ar, [thing] for the child מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַבֶּ֖טֶן <WH990> hab-Be-ten from the womb עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against י֥וֹם <WH3117> Yom to the day מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH4194> mo-To. of his death פ Peh

וַיֶּעְתַּ֥ר <WH6279> vai-ye'-Tar intreated מָנ֛וֹחַ <WH4495> ma-No-ach Then Manoah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar; and said בִּ֣י <WH994> bi O אֲדוֹנָ֔י <WH136> a-do-Nai, my Lord אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish the man הָאֱלֹהִ֞ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom שָׁלַ֗חְתָּ <WH7971> sha-Lach-ta, which thou didst send יָבוֹא־ <WH935> ya-Vo- come again נָ֥א <WH4994> na let עוֹד֙ <WH5750> 'Od again אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <WH413> 'e-Lei-nu, about וְיוֹרֵ֕נוּ <WH3384> ve-yo-Re-nu unto us and teach מַֽה־ <WH4100> mah- what נַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> na-'a-Seh us what we shall do לַנַּ֥עַר <WH5288> lan-Na-'ar unto the child הַיּוּלָּֽד׃ <WH3205> hai-yul-Lad. that shall be born

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' hearkened הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him And God בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol to the voice מָנ֑וֹחַ <WH4495> ma-No-ach; of Manoah וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo came again מַלְאַךְ֩ <WH4397> mal-'aCh and the angel הָאֱלֹהִ֨ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God ע֜וֹד <WH5750> od again אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> ha-'ish-Shah, unto the woman וְהִיא֙ <WH1931> ve-Hi she יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> yo-She-vet as she sat בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh, in the field וּמָנ֥וֹחַ <WH4495> u-ma-No-ach but Manoah אִישָׁ֖הּ <WH376> 'i-Shah her husband אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein else עִמָּֽהּ׃ <WH5973> 'im-Mah. with

וַתְּמַהֵר֙ <WH4116> vat-te-ma-Her made haste הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH376> ha-'ish-Shah, her husband וַתָּ֖רָץ <WH7323> vat-Ta-rotz and ran וַתַּגֵּ֣ד <WH5046> vat-tag-Ged and shewed לְאִישָׁ֑הּ <WH802> le-'i-Shah; And the woman וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer and said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, about הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold נִרְאָ֤ה <WH7200> nir-'Ah hath appeared אֵלַי֙ <WH413> 'e-Lai about הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish, unto him Behold the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who בָּ֥א <WH935> ba unto me that came בַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> vai-Yom unto me the [other] day אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> 'e-Lai. about

וַיָּ֛קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom arose וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech Then מָנ֖וֹחַ <WH4495> ma-No-ach And Manoah אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> ish-To; his wife וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo and came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish, to the man וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said ל֗וֹ lo, הַאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> ha-'at-Tah are you הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish unto him [Art] thou the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who דִּבַּ֥רְתָּ <WH1696> dib-Bar-ta that spakest אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> ha-'ish-Shah his wife וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> 'A-ni. I

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said מָנ֔וֹחַ <WH4495> ma-No-ach, And Manoah עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah Now יָבֹ֣א <WH935> ya-Vo come to pass דְבָרֶ֑יךָ <WH1697> de-va-Rei-cha; Now let thy words מַה־ <WH4100> mah- what יִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become מִשְׁפַּט־ <WH4941> mish-pat- How shall we order הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> han-Na-'ar the child וּמַעֲשֵֽׂהוּ׃ <WH4639> u-ma-'a-Se-hu. and [how] shall we do

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said מַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מָנ֑וֹחַ <WH4495> ma-No-ach; unto Manoah מִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> mik-Kol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- i אָמַ֥רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti Of all that I said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> ha-'ish-Shah unto the woman תִּשָּׁמֵֽר׃ <WH8104> tish-sha-Mer. let her beware

מִכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> mik-Kol anything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- that יֵצֵא֩ <WH3318> ye-Tze of any [thing] that cometh מִגֶּ֨פֶן <WH1612> mig-Ge-fen of the vine הַיַּ֜יִן <WH3196> hai-Ya-yin wine לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo should not תֹאכַ֗ל <WH398> to-Chal, She may not eat וְיַ֤יִן <WH3196> ve-Ya-yin wine וְשֵׁכָר֙ <WH7941> ve-she-Char or strong drink אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nor תֵּ֔שְׁתְּ <WH8354> Te-shet, neither let her drink וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol any טֻמְאָ֖ה <WH2932> tum-'Ah any unclean אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nor תֹּאכַ֑ל <WH398> to-Chal; nor eat כֹּ֥ל <WH3605> kol all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- i צִוִּיתִ֖יהָ <WH6680> tziv-vi-Ti-ha [thing] all that I commanded תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃ <WH8104> tish-Mor. her let her observe

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said מָנ֖וֹחַ <WH4495> ma-No-ach And Manoah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach unto the angel יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD נַעְצְרָה־ <WH6113> na'-tze-rah- I pray thee let us detain נָּ֣א <WH4994> na Please אוֹתָ֔ךְ <WH853> o-Tach, וְנַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> ve-na-'a-Seh thee until we shall have made ready לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha for גְּדִ֥י <WH1423> ge-Di kid עִזִּֽים׃ <WH5795> 'iz-Zim. goat

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> vai-yo-Mer said מַלְאַ֨ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach And the angel יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מָנ֗וֹחַ <WH4495> ma-No-ach, unto Manoah אִם־ <WH518> 'im- and if תַּעְצְרֵ֙נִי֙ <WH6113> ta'-tze-Re-ni Though thou detain לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- I will not אֹכַ֣ל <WH398> 'o-Chal me I will not eat בְּלַחְמֶ֔ךָ <WH3899> be-lach-Me-cha, of thy bread וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh thou wilt offer עֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> 'o-Lah, a burnt offering לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh it unto the LORD תַּעֲלֶ֑נָּה <WH5927> ta-'a-Len-nah; thou must offer כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not יָדַ֣ע <WH3045> ya-Da' knew מָנ֔וֹחַ <WH4495> ma-No-ach, For Manoah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for מַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach not that he [was] an angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said מָנ֛וֹחַ <WH4495> ma-No-ach And Manoah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מַלְאַ֥ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach unto the angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD מִ֣י <WH4310> mi What שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> she-Me-cha; What [is] thy name כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for יָבֹ֥א <WH935> ya-Vo come to pass; דִבְרֵיךָ div-rei-cha כדְבָרְךָ֖ <WH1697> de-va-re-Cha act קוְכִבַּדְנֽוּךָ׃ <WH3513> ve-chib-bad-Nu-cha. we may do thee honour

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said לוֹ֙ lo מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach And the angel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah Why זֶּ֖ה <WH2088> zeh you תִּשְׁאַ֣ל <WH7592> tish-'Al unto him Why askest לִשְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> lish-Mi; thou thus after my name וְהוּא־ <WH1931> ve-hu- he פֶֽלִאי׃ <WH6383> Fe-li. secret ס sa-Mek
